verses.text:
\w Judge|strong="H8199"\w* me, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; for I have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in mine \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w*: I have \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* also in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \add therefore\add* I shall not \w slide|strong="H4571"\w*.
\w Examine|strong="H0974"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w prove|strong="H5254"\w* me; \w try|strong="H6884"\w* my \w reins|strong="H3629"\w* and my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
For thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* \add is\add* before mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: and I have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.
I have not \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* with \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* \w persons|strong="H4962"\w*, neither will I go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* with \w dissemblers|strong="H5956"\w*.
I have \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of evil \w doers|strong="H7489"\w*; and will not \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* with the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

I will \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* mine \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* in \w innocency|strong="H5356"\w*: so will I \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* thine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:
That I may \w publish|strong="H8085"\w* with the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*, and \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* of all thy wondrous \w works|strong="H6381"\w*.

\nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I have \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* the \w habitation|strong="H4583"\w* of thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where thine \w honour|strong="H3519"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="H4908"\w*.\f + \fr 26.8 \ft where…: Heb. of the tabernacle of thy honour\f*

\w Gather|strong="H0622"\w* not my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* with \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w*, nor my \w life|strong="H2416"\w* with \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*:\f + \fr 26.9 \ft Gather…: or, Take not away\f*\f + \fr 26.9 \ft bloody…: Heb. men of blood\f*

In whose \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \add is\add* \w mischief|strong="H2154"\w*, and their right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w bribes|strong="H7810"\w*.\f + \fr 26.10 \ft full…: Heb. filled with\f*
But as for me, I will \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in mine \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w*: \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* me, and be \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w* unto me.

My \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* in an even \w place|strong="H4334"\w*: in the \w congregations|strong="H4721"\w* will I \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
